children.text:
Welcome to your app!
Please press the button below to access all settings and customize your experience.

{{makeSetting.data.error === false ? `Congratulations! Please ensure you save your credentials securely, as they will be displayed only once.` : `Apologies for the inconvenience. It seems that an error has occurred. Kindly attempt your action again in 1 minute. We appreciate your patience.`}}
We sent you a confirmation email to verify that the address {{main.URL.queryParams.email || ""}} is correct
